title: Pixel 3 stuck in fastboot
content:
Yesterday my wifes pixel 3 lost its operating system. Her phone is now stuck in fastboot mode. 
When I Access fastboot by pressing volume down & power I get the options for recovery/bootloader/barcode/power off/start.

The only progression is to the barcode page. All other option take me back to warning screen pictured.

I am unable to run recovery, power off or start fast boot.


I have tried holding down power button for 30 seconds but it just leads me back to below page.

I've spoken to the service provider EE & their technical support could not help after 30mins of trying.

This phone was purchased on 31st Dec 2018 so is under warranty.

Can anyone advise on what I should do next or how to start a warranty claim with Google?

Thanks,
Andy
